actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Labor Standards.

official_title: To provide that certain regulations of the Secretary of Labor relating to the adjudication of claims under the Black Lung Benefits Act shall be of no force or effect.

summary.text: Provides that specified regulations of the Secretary of Labor relating to claims' adjudication under the Black Lung Benefits Act shall be of no force or effect.

titles.title: To provide that certain regulations of the Secretary of Labor relating to the adjudication of claims under the Black Lung Benefits Act shall be of no force or effect.
